definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: sweep bare (Ar. safa0 (y), of wind, raise and carry off dust, 0’asfay of horse, scanty in hair of forelock; NH Pi. plane off; Aram. 4po0 Pt. pass. level (Is 40:4 = [[מִישׁוֹר]]), smooth, limpid, 4apiy make level, smooth (and deriv.));—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: be wind-swept, bare; Pt. [[הַר־נִשְׁפֶּה]] Is 13:2 a bare mt.;

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. consec. [[וְשֻׁפוּ עַחְמׂתָיו]] Job 33:21 Qr his bones are laid bare (so lean is he; Kt [[וּשְׁפִי]] bareness are his bones).
